tips.li: [<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Better traits always appear less often in the game.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Skill interest, skill level and traits are equally important.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]The armor value in trait protects all parts of the body, including fingers and toes.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Colonists with higher skill levels are often better in the early stages than those with the directional traits.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Please use psychic shock lance to catch the enemy with excellent traits.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Excellent traits will help you a lot in difficult times.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Even if the colonists had excellent traits, they could not be invincible.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Take advantage of MPT traits, otherwise vanilla traits will surpass them.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Some original MPT traits have changed in version 1.1.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Colonists with '<color=#66ccff>Nomadic hunter</color>' or '<color=#cc33cc>King of beasts</color>' are better at traveling.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Colonists with '<color=#66ccff>Ranger</color>' or '<color=#cc33cc>Punisher</color>' are better at field operations.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Colonists with '<color=#33ff00>Show moe</color>' have high speed and defense but can't do any work.
[MPT]Colonists with 'Born leader' can help teammates who are in a bad mood.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Colonists with '<color=#66ccff>Priest</color>' can improve relationships with others by discussing faith.
[<color=#FFCC66>MPT</color>]Colonists who have both '<color=#33ff00>Miner</color>' and '<color=#66ccff>Explorer</color>' are better at mining.
